title: Mechanical properties and water vapour corrosion behaviour of AlxCoCrFeNi high-entropy alloys
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24741-24748
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03892D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jingyu Zhang, Lin Huang, Ke Xiong, Xiaofeng Wang, Zhengyun Wang, Dashan Guo, Ziqi Li, Wei Feng
AlxCoCrFeNi high-entropy alloys were prepared using a spark plasma sintering technique combined with aerosol powder and water vapour corrosion was carried out on the sintered sample by means of an independently built steam reaction device.
